channel.title: I made the Ice Sword too :3
channel.description:
Only I used primitives.
Based off of this: [img]http://i1016.photobucket.com/albums/af281/FuckFreedom/IceBlade.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/1623/icesword.png[/img] [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/7290/icesword2.png[/img] [img]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/1787/31275022.png[/img] ^^ 160 polygons ftw?
Tell me what you think of it :)
EDIT: Heres the download link if anybody wants it. The only thing wrong is that the blade comes out yellowish in the client .-. http://uppit.com/v/4G66UWM9

item.title: I made the Ice Sword too :3
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Pascalrs2, post:8, topic:335672”]This has been posted before isn’t it?[/quote]Don’t gravedig -.- and yes, other people made models based off the picture, but I made this one.[quote=“mongoth666, post:9, topic:335672”]You won’t feel offended if i make a model using the same pic…i’ll give you 80% credit?[/quote]Not my pic, so go for it :3

Read full topic
item.source: I made the Ice Sword too :3

item.title: I made the Ice Sword too :3
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:335672”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=432054.msg3171580#msg3171580 date=1270490150]

[quote author=qadh link=topic=432054.msg3171576#msg3171576 date=1270490048]

Nice but I don’t think its nice to make newcomers feel bad by making their ideas look better and them look worse.
[/quote]I’m not trying to do that by any means, I’m trying to show just how much better primitives are than tracing once you can use them

Then Try doing exactly this but pm it to the person because in some ways this topic might run over the other one and make the other person feel bad.
[/quote]But its an example for everyone to see <.< I wanted to show everyone why primitives are better.

Correct.
Maybe instead you should make a different model rather then the same one they are making.[/quote]I considered it, but it wouldn’t be as effective. I purposely made this sword rather than some other as a comparison. Since the other people who made this traced the model, I just wanted to show the possibilities with prims.

Read full topic
item.source: I made the Ice Sword too :3
